definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan

sentences.english: Experiment of culturing Tricholoma giganteum by using rapeseed coat as culture material was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 用菜籽皮作培養料進行了巨大口蘑的栽培對比試驗。

sentences.english: Agaricas brunnelens is the new breed developed in Hebei Bashang region.
sentences.chinese: 香口蘑是河北壩上地區近年來馴化栽培成功的新品種。

sentences.english: This result offers insights for further study and exploitation of the precious mushroom.
sentences.chinese: 爲深入研究和開發珍貴的松口蘑提供了科學依據。

sentences.english: The research mainly investigated preparative technique of polypeptide from Tricholomamongolicum.
sentences.chinese: 本研究以蒙古口蘑爲原料，製取多肽。

sentences.english: The shiro is the basis of growth, development and yield of Tricholoma matsutake.
sentences.chinese: 松口蘑窩是松口蘑生長髮育和產量形成的基礎。

sentences.english: The shiro is the basis of growth, development and yield of Tricholoma matsutake.
sentences.chinese: 松口蘑窩是松口蘑生長髮育和產量形成的基礎。

sentences.english: Tricholoma beauty is a good diet food.
sentences.chinese: 口蘑是一種較好的減肥美容食品。

definition: tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
enoki mushroom (Flammulina velutipes, Japanese えのき茸 enokitake), used in cuisines of Japan, Korea and China, cultivated to be long, thin and white/abbr. to 金菇
